documentation.text: @notice Mark a loan as defaulted (called by owner/credit officer after delinquency)
@notice Write off a defaulted loan. Uses reserve first, then poolCash. Reduces NAV.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct VaultLendingV4.Loan memory[] memory)
